title: S17 Ep133: Return to the Lizzie Borden House w/ Jared Robinson
itunes:title: Return to the Lizzie Borden House w/ Jared Robinson
description:
Darkness Radio presents Return to the Lizzie Borden House w/ Jared Robinson!

The Lizzie Borden House is notorious for being the home of Lizzie Borden and her family, and it is the location of the 1892 unsolved double murder of Lizzie's father and stepmother Andrew and Abby Borden. It is a treasure trove pf paranormal activity and for decades, has been open to the public for tours and ghost hunts.

In 2001, the Lizzie Borden House was put up for sale. and bought by US Ghost Adventures for the express use of house tours, ghost tours, and ghost hunts.  our guest today, Jared Robinson, was hired as the General Manager of the Lizzie Borden house, but what a lot of people may not know is that Jared and his family have history with the house that go back decades!

Jared joins Darkness Radio today to talk about his childhood experiences with the house, how the house called him back "home", the experiences new employees have had with the house and even some guests' experiences!

Check out the video of this experience these guests have that Jared described on the show: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zOY5LJAnQWU 

Book a tour or a room at the Lizzie Borden House:  https://lizzie-borden.com/
